content: I do not have the ability to watch or experience dance performances. however, i do have information about some of the most renowned contemporary dance performances of all time. some of the most notable contemporary dance pieces include "rain," choreographed by anne teresa de keersmaeker; "rosas danst rosas," choreographed by the same choreographer and performed by her dance company rosas; and "ballet de la nuit," choreographed by maurice béjart. contemporary dance is a genre that is constantly evolving, and there are many other amazing works that have been created in recent years.
